beer.name: Oatmeal Stout
beer.description: While it may resemble a popular Irish stout, our Oatmeal Stout is quite different. Most notably it's sweeter. Chocolate, coffee and caramel flavors round out this smooth, full-bodied beer.
beer.grains: harrington, caramel, oats, crystal, roasted barley, chocolate malt
harrington, caramel, oats, crystal, roasted barley, chocolate malt
